dmca.title: notice of infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Purplemath [mailto:stapel@purplemath.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 14, 2007 11:42 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: notice of infringement

Dear DMCA Agent,

It has come to our attention that copyrighted content, created by
Elizabeth Stapel for Purplemath, has been posted to the Everyones
Internet servers by an apparent client of EV1 hosting.

According to documents on the Everyones Internet/The Planet web site,
the governing DMCA policy is as posted on the following page:

   http://www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

In accordance with your stated requirements, you are therefore being
provided with the following information:

==============================================
==============================================

1) The following is an electronic copy of the signature of the
Purplemath copyright owner:

/Elizabeth Stapel/

As the copyright owner, Elizabeth Stapel is authorized to speak on the
behalf of the copyright owner.

(Copyright Registration Numbers TX 5-725-275, TX 5-804-898, TX
5-956-884, and TX 6-381-282; statutory damages may apply)

( http://www.purplemath.com/terms.htm )

==============================================

2) The identity of the copyrighted materials infringed:

bottom half of the following page:
http://www.purplemath.com/modules/binomial.htm

entire text of:
http://www.purplemath.com/modules/binomial2.htm

Note: The original copyright information ("Copyright (c) Elizabeth
Stapel
2000-2006 All Rights Reserved")is visible in your client's infringing
copy.

==============================================

3) The identity of the material claimed to be an infringement:

http://www.hibeesbounce.com/forum/showthread.php?t=50145

==============================================

4) Information reasonably sufficient to allow the online service
provider to contact the complaining party:

Elizabeth Stapel
2944 East Edgewood Avenue
Mesa AZ  85204-4705

480.830.4927

stapel@purplemath.com

==============================================

5) Statement that the complaining party has "a good faith belief that
use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent or the law."

"I, Elizabeth Stapel, creator and owner of the lessons content and
images on all the pages listed at:

http://www.purplemath.com/

...have never given permission to Hibeesbounce, the Hibeesbounce forums,
"SirIsaacNewton" or any other users, Everyones Internet, EV1 Servers,
The Planet, GI Partners, their clients, their vendors, or any other of
their agents to copy, mirror, download/upload, frame, hotlink, rework,
or otherwise present my work, or derivatives thereof, as his/her/their
own.

"I, Elizabeth Stapel, hereby reiterate my good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent or the law."

==============================================

6) Statement that the information in the notice is accurate, and under
penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the copyright owner.

"To the best of my knowledge, the information I, Elizabeth Stapel, have
hereby presented is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the
complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the copyright
owner."

==============================================
==============================================

Please note that we could not determine any functioning contact method
for your client. Since your client appears to be unreachable, the DMCA
filing is being directed to you, as the host of record (according to the
IP address of 207.44.231.138).

If you need the above to be directed to any additional addresses, or if
you need any further documentation, or to have the above documentation
reformatted, or in some other way refashioned, please provide specific
advice.

Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Sincerely,

Elizabeth Stapel
Purplemath - Your Algebra Resource
http://www.purplemath.com/
